Posts.Content: Apr 17, 2010 05:47PM AnnJ wrote: My diagnosis was the same as yours, except that I was 56 at diagnosis (I am now 58).  My oncotype test score was 14.  My onc and surgeon took 2 weeks battling the chemo.  Surgeon wanted chemo, onc doctor felt I should not. I did not have chemo.  It took some time, because at first I kept wondering about not having chemo, but I finally worked through this decision and decided I would never 2nd guess myself, even if it comes back.  But you are quite young...in the research I've seen concerning woman under 40 it suggests you may want to look more seriously at having chemo. Best to you, and remember, you are not alone.
Posts.Title: Stage IIA with no Chemo yunlee72 Janina
